code: import React,{useState}from'react';import axios from'axios';import{useNavigate}from'react-router-dom';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Login=()=>{const[username,setUsername]=useState('');const[password,setPassword]=useState('');const navigate=useNavigate();const handleLogin=async()=>{try{const response=await axios.post('http://localhost:8000/api/login/',{username,password});localStorage.setItem('token',response.data.access);navigate('/dashboard');}catch(error){console.error(error);}};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",placeholder:"Username",onChange:e=>setUsername(e.target.value)}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"password",placeholder:"Password",onChange:e=>setPassword(e.target.value)}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:handleLogin,children:"Login"})]});};export default Login;
